Package ohos.sysappcomponents.contact

Class ContactsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.contact.ContactsHelper

  • public class ContactsHelper
extends Object
    Contact management class that provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and querying contacts.
    Since:
    4

    • Method Detail

      • queryContactsByPhoneNumber

        public ContactsCollection queryContactsByPhoneNumber​(String phoneNumber,
                                                     Holder holder,
                                                     ContactAttributes attrs)
        Queries contacts by a phone number, holder, and contact attribute.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS.

        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Indicates the phone number. Only full match is supported, and wildcards are not supported.
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        attrs - Indicates the contact attribute. If this parameter is null, all attributes will be used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns the ContactsCollection object.
        Since:
        4

      • queryContactsByEmail

        public ContactsCollection queryContactsByEmail​(String email,
                                               Holder holder,
                                               ContactAttributes attrs)
        Queries contacts by a specified email address, contact holder, and contact attributes.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        email - Indicates the email address.
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        attrs - Indicates the contact attributes. If this parameter is null, all attributes are used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns a ContactsCollection object.
        Since:
        4

      • queryHolders

        public HoldersCollection queryHolders​()
        Queries contact holders.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Returns:
        Returns the HoldersCollection object.
        Since:
        4

      • queryContacts

        public ContactsCollection queryContacts​(Holder holder,
                                        ContactAttributes attrs)
        Queries contacts with query conditions.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        attrs - Indicates the contact attributes. If this parameter is null, all attributes are used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns the ContactsCollection object.
        Since:
        4

      • queryMyCard

        public Contact queryMyCard​(ContactAttributes attrs)
        Queries information about "my card".

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        attrs - Indicates the contact attributes. If this parameter is null, all attributes are used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns information about "my card".
        Since:
        4

      • queryContact

        public Contact queryContact​(String key,
                            Holder holder,
                            ContactAttributes attrs)
        Queries a specified contact of specified attributes.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the unique query key of a contact.
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        attrs - Indicates the contact attributes. If this parameter is null, all attributes are used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns the specified contact.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        ContactAttributes

      • addContact

        public long addContact​(Contact contact)
        Creates a contact.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        contact - Indicates the contact information.
        Returns:
        Returns the contact ID (which can be obtained by Contact#getId()) if the creation is successful; returns Contact#INVALID_CONTACT_ID if the creation fails.
        Since:
        4

      • deleteContact

        public boolean deleteContact​(String key)
        Deletes a specified contact.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        key - Indicates the unique query key of a contact to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the contact is deleted; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • updateContact

        public boolean updateContact​(Contact contact,
                             ContactAttributes attrs)
        Updates specified attributes of a contact.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        contact - Indicates the contact whose information is to update.
        attrs - Indicates the contact attributes to update. If this parameter is null, all available attributes will be updated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the update is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • isMyCard

        public boolean isMyCard​(long id)
        Checks whether the contact ID is of "my card".
        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the contact ID.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the contact ID is of "my card"; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4

      • queryGroups

        public List<Group> queryGroups​(Holder holder)
        Queries contact groups.

        Permissions: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS, SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns the contact group list.
        Since:
        4

      • queryKey

        public String queryKey​(long id,
                       Holder holder)
        Obtains the query key of a contact based on a specified ID and holder.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the contact ID.
        holder - Indicates the contact holder. If this parameter is null, the default holder is used for matching.
        Returns:
        Returns the query key of the contact.
        Since:
        4
        See Also:
        Contact.getKey()

      • isLocalContact

        public boolean isLocalContact​(long id)
        Checks whether the contact ID is in the local phone book.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.READ_CONTACTS and SystemPermission.WRITE_CONTACTS

        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the contact ID.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the contact ID is in the local phone book; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        4
